name: Think Tool
semantic_context: Invite the AI agent to do some thinking
natural_language_description: 这是 Think Tool 节点。主要用于: Invite the AI agent to do some thinking

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI agent. Insert one

description.name: description
description.default: Use the tool to think about something. It will not obtain new information or change the database, but just append the thought to the log. Use it when complex reasoning or some cache memory is needed.
description.natural_language_description: 参数名: Think Tool Description | 作用: The thinking tool's description | 默认值: Use the tool to think about something. It will not obtain new information or change the database, but just append the thought to the log. Use it when complex reasoning or some cache memory is needed. | (必填项)

output_contract.standardizer_logic: return { payload: { primary: upstream.thought || upstream.text || upstream.content || upstream } }
